name: healer
caption: Healer

effect.short: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} after each turn.
effect.full: Friendly Pokémon next to this Pokémon in double and triple battles each have a 30% chance of being cured of any [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment} after each turn.

flavorText: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
